.
#Heading 1
test
.
<h1 toc="true">Heading 1</h1>
<p>test</p>
.

.
a ### in a line does not indicate that it's a heading
.
<p>a ### in a line does not indicate that it's a heading</p>
.

.
##**Heading 2**
.
<h2 toc="true"><strong>Heading 2</strong></h2>
.

.
###Heading 3
.
<h3 toc="true">Heading 3</h3>
.

.
####Heading 4
.
<h4 toc="true">Heading 4</h4>
.

.
_text above_
####Heading 4

.
<p><em>text above</em></p>
<h4 toc="true">Heading 4</h4>
.

.
###! Heading 3 no toc
.
<h3>Heading 3 no toc</h3>
.


coverage
.
*~f
.
<p>*~f</p>
.

clean up init (constructor)
remove icon
